name: ecommerce
description: E-commerce application with React frontend and microservice backend

scripts.dev: concurrently --names backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: npm test --prefix backend && npm test --prefix frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix backend && npm run test:coverage --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix backend && npm run typecheck --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.deploy:frontend: npm run build --prefix frontend && aws s3 sync frontend/dist/ s3://$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ecommerce --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`FrontendBucket`].OutputValue' --output text) --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name ecommerce --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`CloudFrontUrl`].OutputValue' --output text | grep -o '[A-Z0-9]*$') --paths '/*'
